txt.en: Instance: The War of Three Peaks
Zarkul-sulûn has been occupied, a new foothold for the Gabil'akkâ!

'We need to seize Zarkul-sulûn if we are to push through Elderslade toward Gundabad! The Zhélruka will lead the way behind their prince, and my Longbeards will follow them!\n\n'We have Orcs to slay, [placeholder]! Stay close to me!'
'All around me I see only Longbeards! Where are the Zhélruka? Where is Ingór?'

Durin has commanded that the assault on Gundabad begin by seizing a foothold further ahead in the foothills of Elderslade: the ruin of Zarkul-sulûn will become the base of operations for the Gabil'akkâ!
Prince Durin has commanded that the Gabil'akkâ seize the ruin of Zarkul-sulûn from the Orcs.
Fight alongside Prince Durin as he attempts to seize Zarkul-sulûn from the Orcs
Talk to Durin during the assault on Zarkul-sulûn
Durin has been defeated! You have failed!
'Where is Ingór? He was to lead his Zhélruka up the slope!'
'My Longbeards will be more than enough to slay you, Orc!'
